name: Schibsted ASA
goal: Schibsted Media Group is an international media group with aproximately 8000 employees in 22 countries. Schibsted's goal is to become a global leader  within online classifieds and to develop world class media houses.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Press subsidies regulations
Data Protections regulations
Competition regulations
EU directive for diversity and non-financial indicators
